= Getting Started =


There are few items needed to install and configure ArduPilot Ground Control Station:

  # Get Google Earth [GoogleEarth Instructions]
  # Get LabVIEW Run-Time Engine [LabVIEWrt Instructions]
  # Get ArduPilot Ground Control Station applications [GCS Instructions]

- - -

If you want to see the code you can find it [http://code.google.com/p/ardupilotgcs/source/browse/#svn/trunk here]
